Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

The bearers of this are Sebastião Afonso da Silva and José Luís da Silva, whom I sent as firefighters to the district of Barra, to observe the enemy's movements before my next departure on the past 30th of August; and both duly accounted for the amount of fifty thousand réis, of which Your Excellency 25$000 rs.

God keep Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Antônio Elzeário de Miranda e Brito Field Marshal and President of the Province and Commander of the Arms thereof. Porto Alegre, September 13, 1838. (a) Francisco Pedro de Abreu Major

Order to the Pay Office.

An order was given to the Pay Office on the 14th of the said month.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Antônio Elzeário de Miranda e Brito. From Major Francisco Pedro de Abreu.
